mysql --defaults-file=D:\mysql-5.7.21-winx64\my.ini -u -root -p
my.ini配置文件
该配置可解决编码问题
# For advice on how to change settings please see
# http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/server-configuration-defaults.html
# *** DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. It's a template which will be copied to the
# *** default location during install, and will be replaced if you
# *** upgrade to a newer version of MySQL.
[client]
default-character-set = utf8
[mysqld]
character_set_server = utf8
# Remove leading # and set to the amount of RAM for the most important data
# cache in MySQL. Start at 70% of total RAM for dedicated server, ese 10%.
#innodb_buffer_pool_size = 128M

# Remove leading # to turn on a very important data integrity option: logging
# changes to the binary log between backups.
# log_bin

# These are commonly set, remove the # and set as required.
basedir = D:\Program Files\green\mysql-5.7.21-winx64
datadir = D:\Program Files\green\mysql-5.7.21-winx64\data
port = 3306


# Remove leading # to set options mainly useful for reporting servers.
# The server defaults are faster for transactions and fast SELECTs.
# Adjust sizes as needed, experiment to find the optimal values.
# join_buffer_size = 128M
# sort_buffer_size = 2M
# read_rnd_buffer_size = 2M

sql_mode=NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES
mysql安装流程
1.解压压缩包
2.添加环境变量
3.在安装目录当中新建my.ini文件，拷贝上面的配置，记着修改两个目录，并设置ansi编码
4.以管理员方式运行cmd
5.cmd下进入mysql的bin目录
6.执行mysqld install 安装mysql服务
8.执行mysqld  --initialize 初始化mysql，在data目录下的以用户名.err命名的文件会记录root用户的初始密码
9.执行net start mysql 启动mysql服务
10.mysql -u root -p登录mysql
11.使用后面的命令修改密码ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'new_password';
12.如果想开启局域网访问（注意防火墙问题），使用如下命令：
    grant all privileges on *.* to root@"%" identified by 'password' with grant option;  
    flush privileges;
12.it's over.
注意事项
1.data目录不要自己新建，安装前有则删除
2.my.ini文件的编码尽量是英文编码（如windows中的ANSI
3.my.ini文件当中的两个目录一定要修改为自己的，分隔符/、\、\\都没有问题
4.一定要在mysql的bin目录执行安装相关命令
5.启动服务前记得使用mysqld --initialize命令进行初始化
